name: Introduction to Optimization
title: Introduction to Optimization
description: This edX course by Song-Pil Hong and Min Hee Lee covers modern optimization fundamentals, including linear and nonlinear models, with applications in urban railway routing and congestion prediction.

name: Linear Programming for Data Science
title: Linear Programming for Data Science
description: Explore Linear Programming for Data Science on Great Learning, taught by Dr. P.K. VISWANATHAN, for a free introduction to optimizing data science models using linear programming techniques.

name: Linear Programming
title: Linear Programming
description: Explore Linear Programming at Khan Academy to learn optimization techniques for maximizing or minimizing linear functions within constraints.

name: Linear Programming
title: Linear Programming
description: Learn the basics of linear programming, including objective functions, constraints, and optimization, in this video by The Organic Chemistry Tutor from YouTube.

name: Gradient Descent
title: Gradient Descent
description: Learn about gradient descent, how it works, the algorithm behind it, and its applications in machine learning and deep learning, explained by Aman from the Unfold Data Science YouTube channel.

name: Gradient Descent
title: Gradient Descent
description: Josh Starmer from the Youtube channel StatQuest with Josh Starmer explains gradient descent, covering single-variable optimization, loss functions, the gradient descent algorithm, and stochastic gradient descent

name: Introduction and Agenda of Stochastic Gradient Descent
title: Introduction and Agenda of Stochastic Gradient Descent
description: This course taught by Shambavi Gupta on Great Learning explains the optimization technique used in machine learning for minimizing loss functions and its practical applications.

name: Stochastic Gradient Descent
title: Introduction and Agenda of Stochastic Gradient Descent
description: This video by Josh Starmer from the Youtube channel StatQuest with Josh Starmer introduces Stochastic Gradient Descent (SGD), explaining its role in optimizing machine learning models by iteratively adjusting weights to minimize the loss function.

name: Convex Optimization
title: Convex Optimization
description: This course, led by Stephen Boyd and Henryk Blasinski on EdX, teaches how to recognize, solve, and apply convex optimization problems, covering theory, computational methods, and practical applications.

name: Convex Optimization
title: Convex Optimization
description: This course covers convex optimization, including theory, methods, and applications in fields like machine learning, engineering, and finance. Taught by Professor Stephen Boyd from the YouTube channel Stanford Online

name: Non-convex Optimization
title: Convex Optimization
description: This playlist, Non-convex Optimization and Deep Learning Workshop from YouTube channel Leo Du, covers non-convex optimization methods and their applications in deep learning.

name: Method of Lagrange Multipliers
title: Method of Lagrange Multipliers
description: The course on the Method of Lagrange Multipliers, provided by GreatLearning and taught by instructor R. Ramya, covers how to optimize functions subject to constraints. It introduces Lagrange multipliers to solve these problems effectively.

name: Lagrange multipliers and constrained optimization
title: Lagrange multipliers and constrained optimization
description: The Khan Academy video explains using Lagrange multipliers for constrained optimization, showing how tangency between the gradients of the objective function and constraint reveals optimal solutions.

name: Lagrange Multipliers
title: Convex Optimization
description: Dr. Trefor Bazett's video explains how Lagrange multipliers solve constrained optimization by finding points where the function's contour lines are tangent to the constraint curve. This condition leads to the equation involving the gradients of the function and the constraint.

name: Duality
title: Duality
description: The Duality playlist on YouTube by the channel MathPod explains duality in optimization, focusing on the relationship between primal and dual problems. It simplifies these concepts for better understanding and application.

name: Bayesian Optimization for Engineers
title: Bayesian Optimization for Engineers
description: The YouTube channel Modeling, Identification, Control (A. Sala) compiles videos on Bayesian Optimization, covering the entire methodology. This main list will include all uploads, while a separate, shorter list focuses on introductory topics.

name: Bayesian Optimization
title: Bayesian Optimization
description: The YouTube video by Wotao Yin explains Bayesian Optimization, focusing on Surrogate Models, Acquisition Functions, and their application in optimization tasks like hyperparameter tuning. They provide practical insights into the algorithm and its implementation.

name: Constrained optimization introduction
title: Constrained optimization introduction
description: This Khan Academy video from YouTube introduces constrained optimization, explaining how to find optimal values under specific constraints.

name: Constrained Optimization Lecture
title: Constrained Optimization Lecture
description: This series from the YouTube channel Mathfied covers the fundamentals of constrained optimization, focusing on methods to find optimal solutions within specified constraints.

name: Constrained Optimization: Intuition behind the Lagrangian
title: Constrained Optimization: Intuition behind the Lagrangian
description: This content from the YouTube channel MATLAB explains the intuition behind the Lagrangian method in constrained optimization, detailing how it helps find optimal solutions while respecting constraints.

name: Adam Optimization Algorithm (C2W2L08)
title: Adam Optimization Algorithm (C2W2L08)
description: This video from the YouTube channel DeeplearningAI explains the Adam optimization algorithm, a popular method in deep learning for improving training efficiency by adjusting learning rates for each parameter.

name: Optimization Algorithms
title: Optimization Algorithms
description: These lectures from Constantine Caramanis on YouTube cover advanced convex optimization algorithms, including gradient descent, stochastic methods, and dual decomposition. They offer in-depth analysis and practical insights into various optimization techniques

name: Multi-Objective Optimization
title: Multi-Objective Optimization
description: This video from the YouTube channel Pareto's explains multi-objective optimization, focusing on methods for solving problems involving multiple conflicting objectives. It provides insights into balancing and finding efficient solutions.

name: Multi-Objective Optimization
title: Multi-Objective Optimization
description: This video from the YouTube channel StudyKorner introduces multi-objective optimization, explaining approaches to handle problems with multiple objectives and how to achieve balanced solutions.

name: Multi-Objective Optimization
title: Multi-Objective Optimization
description: This video from the YouTube channel OpenMDAO explains multi-objective optimization, covering methods to address multiple goals within complex design processes and achieve balanced solutions.
